description: This file demonstrates the use of multiple asynchronous tool execution hooks with an agent, including a custom toolkit class for customer database operations, and hooks for validation and logging around tool calls.

classes.name: CustomerDBTools
classes.description: A toolkit class that registers methods for retrieving and deleting customer profiles, demonstrating async and sync method handling.

methods.name: retrieve_customer_profile
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a customer profile from the database, returning a JSON string with customer details.

methods.name: delete_customer_profile
methods.description: Deletes a customer profile from the database, returning a confirmation string.

methods.name: validation_hook
methods.description: An async hook function that validates input arguments before executing the target function, and sanitizes output for specific functions.

methods.name: logger_hook
methods.description: An async hook function that logs before and after the execution of the target function.
